subject: Re: Order #SSN4951, how did it go?
description_text:
I have not received this yet and when I look at the tracking it is in what
looks like Chinese with a very old date on it.

On Tue, Jan 6, 2026 at 1:11 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Christy, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Christy Belanger,     The tracking information has now been updated. Please check the tracking records to see the latest shipping status.

Thank you for the help in translating. I have received it.

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 12:13 AM service@simsonn.com
